::Savanna::

She got a fist in the face and landed on the ground on her side. She 
very slowly got up on her feet and looked at the Predacons.
She was breathing heavily and feeling immence pain.  "Then I have no 
choice. If I surrend, will you leave my friends alone?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Sorry, RFA, if I were to wait for you all night, my characters 
would be 
> giving an open invitation for other Maximals to come and help, or 
let you 
> three get away.  Sorry, I just can't do that, it would go against 
the 
> attitude of my characters)
> 
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:
 
> 
Imprisoner laughed at seeing Hot Rod go down, but yelled in pain as 
he blocked Savanna's claws with his left arm, sending a punch towards 
the  Maximal's face. Predator headed for Savanna, weapon raised. 
Choran headed for Savanna as well, weapons raised. 
 "Surrender, Maximal!  Or you and your friends die!" Imprisoner 
yelled,  laughing evilly, raising his weapon at her.
